How to interview a Complainant, Respondent and Witness.
How to analyse evidence and make recommendations.

items.title: Basics of Asset Management, Evaluation & Planning

items.title: Operations Management for Business Excellence

visible_instructors.name: M.P.
visible_instructors.job_title: Past Exe-Director. Current Management Consultant & Advisor.
visible_instructors.title: M.P. Tyagi

items.headline: Complete course for learning & skill upgrading in Industrial Engg, Facilities Planning, PPC, Sales Forecasting, QMS, ERP
objectives_summary: You will understand the basic principles of Operations Management, which would give you the ability to achieve business excellence, increase the efficiency and effectiveness of your processes.
This course will teach you how to improve, manage, and regulate all aspects of a successful manufacturing operations infrastructure.
You’ll develop the ability to design and oversee an effective master production schedule that makes the best possible use of your manufacturing resources.
